name: Preeti Malakar
content: Preeti Malakar Preeti Malakar I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur. Prior to this, I was a postdoc and then an Assistant Computer Scientist at the Argonne National Laboratory, USA. I was also a Visiting Affiliate at the Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory, USA. I completed my PhD from the Indian Institute of Science Bangalore under Prof. Vijay Natarajan and Prof. Sathish Vadhiyar. Teaching Research Publications SParCL Reading group CV Misc News Email: pmalakar at cse dot iitk dot ac dot in Prospective Students: If you are interested to work in the field of high performance (parallel/large-scale) computing and have a strong interest in computer systems with a strong programming background (C/C++), send me an email with the subject line "Interested in HPC".
